sn31.1:4.1: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī, in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery. …
sn31.1:4.3: “Mendicants, I will teach you about the gods of fairykind.
sn31.1:4.5: And what are the gods of fairykind?
sn31.1:4.6: There are gods who live in fragrant roots,
sn31.1:4.16: These are called the gods of fairykind.”
